Posts.Content: May 1, 2010 01:19AM Suse64 wrote: Hi, not finished yet with radiation, two weeks left to go....I was dx stage one IDC and have decided for myself not to do the AIs or tam.  I had a couple of superficial blood clots in my leg a few years ago, and don't want the risk of a stroke added to the bc dx.  I am 64 years old, and being as my tumor was only .23 mm not even as big as a BB, I think I will risk my chances without any further treatment.
Posts.Title: Stage 1 did you take hormone therapy? NancyLa NancyLa
